summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PokerNight behavioral ledger MVP. All backend APIs working perfectly (17/17 tests passed). Frontend loads correctly with proper OAuth integration, dashboard displays real data from backend, and UI components are functional.
passed_tests: Root API endpoint (/api/) returns correct message
Authentication with test user session token
Game management (create, get, details, start, end)
Landing page loads with proper branding and features
Sign In button redirects to OAuth provider correctly
User data displays correctly (Welcome back, Test)
Groups page shows created groups with correct details
Navigation between Dashboard and Groups pages
Group creation modal opens and displays form fields
